_sText:
This is my first map. After reading some tutorials 4 days ago, I decided to get my feet wet.

Special thanks to mck-76...the original mapper of gg_lego_arena (proper credits are given in the txt file and on a textured map decal visible on the map).

The modifications include:
1. Expanded the walkable surface
2. The 4 blocks located in corners are now rooms
3. Added tunnels in the lower level that can access the 4 rooms
4. Retextured the brushes.

The black and white textures were intentionally used to depict a mafia colorization for my clan.

Please give some feedback and be critical. I know that I have a long ways to go to be a mapper.

The zip files includes the bsp, nav, txt, and gg spawnpoints.
